subject: Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
lead_paragraph: The Czech rider Leopold Konig used a final uphill surge to win the eighth stage of the Spanish Vuelta, and Nicolas Roche, who was third, took over the leader’s red jersey.
snippet: The Czech rider Leopold Konig used a final uphill surge to win the eighth stage of the Spanish Vuelta, and Nicolas Roche, who was third, took over the leader’s red jersey.
